title: BOLO JOINS RHOA! + Summer House Sandwiches & Winter (House) Is Coming

description:
The BOLO episode of The Real Housewives of Atlanta is finally here and it DOES NOT DISAPPOINT! The episode features a Basic Instinct knockoff, fishing trip, and LOTS of Bolo action. After the RHOA recap, Danny dives in to the most recent Summer House, which saw Hubbs getting activated over sandwiches and Danielle being. Finally, Danny breaks down the news that Winter House is coming and RHOM is returning!


Summer House Recap: 25:15ish

Winter House/RHOM News: 38:05ish
